    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns this aircraft's name

      • getBearing

        public float getBearing()
        Returns this aircraft's bearing as calculated from its velocity

        This means that this method returns an angle from 0 to 360 where 0 degrees points upwards (positive y direction).

        Returns:
        the bearing of this aircraft

      • getWeight

        public float getWeight()
        Returns this aircraft's weight

        Description copied from class: AirspaceObject

        Parameters:
